titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 596) to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 596) to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-13, by Mr. Burgess.
The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 6.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 70.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 242 - 176 (Roll no. 54).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 178 (Roll no. 55).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 596) to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
